price: Twanabahundagajeho impuhwe zacu. Mu by’ukuri bari bamwe mu bakora ibikorwa byiza.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhum fī raḥmatinā innahum mina al-ṣāliḥīna
